data.name: Money Makes Money
data.detailed_description:
For release April 2019

Money Makes Money is a game about personal finance and investment.

Starting age 10, during each year of your life you decide how best to invest your time and money.

The game covers almost every option in life an individual has to invest in or reduce spending on.

Spending Options:

  • Luxuries
  • Experiences
  • Cost Of Living
  • Borrowing
  • Education
  • Insurance
  • Legacy

Investment Options:

  • Employment
  • Real Estate
  • Stock Market
  • Bonds
  • FOREX
  • Entrepreneur
  • Savings
  • Commodities
  • Crypto Currency
  • Precious Metals
  • Collectables
  • Gambling
  • Tax Avoidance
  • Pensions
  • Benefits

Finally, the government does not allow us to make money without paying Tax....so there is a full set of tax liabilities you will have to pay each year.

So, will you live life as a pauper or become a millionaire?

data.short_description: Explore different strategies to manage your finances. Discover if you will live life as a pauper or become a millionaire.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal Speaker

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal Speaker

data.legal_notice: All 3rd party images and audio used in this game has been purchased under a royalty free agreement.
